def Load(widget): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Frotas.Definicoes") from Benner.Corporativo.Frotas.Definicoes.Entidades import MFOrdemServico from Benner.Corporativo.Frotas.Definicoes.Entidades import MFOrdemAquisicaoExterna
form = widget.ProviderWidget if form == None: return entity = form.Entity if entity == None: return
tipoOrdem = entity.Fields["TIPOORDEMMANUTENCAO"].ToString()
formExce = entity.Fields["FORMAEXECUCAO"].ToString()
if MFOrdemServico.EhFormaExecucaoInterno(formExce): widget.Hidden = True return elif not MFOrdemServico.TemAquisicoesInternasExternas(tipoOrdem): widget.Hidden = True
handleOs = entity.Fields["HANDLE"]
widget.View.Commands["CMD_CANCELAR"].Visible = MFOrdemAquisicaoExterna.PodeCancelar(handleOs)
